sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-container v-if="platforms">
    <v-row>
      <v-col>
        <v-card>
          Description
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
      <template v-for="platform in platforms">
        <v-col :key="platform.id">
          <v-card class="text-right">
            {{ platform.name.name }}
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </template>
    </v-row>
    <v-row  v-for="item in displayItems" :key="item[1]">
      <v-col>
        <v-card class="mx-auto">
          {{ item[0] }}
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
        <v-col v-for="platform in platforms" :key="platform.id">
          <v-card class="text-right mx-auto">
            <v-card-text>
            {{ platform[item[1]] | toCurrency2DP }}
            </v-card-text>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
    </v-row>
    <v-row>
      <v-col>
        <v-card class="mx-auto">
          Asset Allocation
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
        <v-col v-for="platform in platforms" :key="platform.id">
          <v-card v-if="platform.aaData"
                  class="text-right mx-auto">
            <AssetAllocation
            :aaData="platform.aaData"
            :groupingTotal="platform.platform_total"/>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
import AssetAllocation from "@/components/AssetAllocation.vue";

export default {
  name: "Output",
  props: {
    scenarioId: {
      type: String,
      required: true
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      platforms: [],
      platformFees: [],
      displayItems: [
          ["Administration fee (flat)","platform_admin_fee_dollar"],
          ["Administration fee (floating)","platform_admin_fee_percentage"],
          ["Expense recovery fee (flat)","platform_expense_recovery_dollar"],
          ["Expense receovery fee (floating)", "platform_expense_recovery_percentage"],
          ["ORR Levy", "platform_ORR_levy"],
          ["Fund accounting fee (flat)", "platform_fund_accounting_fee_dollar"],
          ["Fund accounting fee (floating)","platform_fund_accounting_fee_percentage"],
          ["Trustee fee","platform_trustee_fee"],
          ["Issuer fee", "platform_issuer_fee"],
          ["SMA admin fee", "platform_sma_admin_fee"],
        ],
    };
  },
  components: {
      AssetAllocation,
  },
  methods: {
    async getPlatformData() {
      let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/`;
      let data = await apiService(endpoint);
        this.platforms.push(...data.results);
        this.getPlatformAA();
    },
    getPlatformAA() {
      if (this.platforms) {
        for (let i = 0; i < this.platforms.length; i++) {
          let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platforms[i].id}/aa/`;
          apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
            this.$set(this.platforms[i],"aaData",data.results);
          });
        }
      }
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getPlatformData();
  },
};
</script>

<style lang="css" scoped>
</style>
